title: Eric Swalwell's Pro-Abortion Fever Dream Is a Pro-Life Reality | Guests: Herb Geraghty & Sara Gonzales | 10/19/22
description:
The attack on Christianity is worsening, as the Left is doing everything it can to push its radical agenda, with President Biden's DOJ helping every step of the way. Glenn and Stu react to Rep. Eric Swalwell’s latest gaslighting ad. Glenn looks into the DHS’ Faith Based Security Advisory Council and the controversial beliefs of its members. Herb Geraghty, the latest pro-life activist indicted by the DOJ for alleged FACE Act violations, shares his optimism about taking his case to court and fighting this weaponized government. BlazeTV host Sara Gonzales exposes the lies and child abuse occurring at drag shows around the country. BlazeTV host Matt Kibbe joins to look into Dr. Fauci and how he rose to power. Stu gives Glenn the latest poll numbers for some critical races this midterm election.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
